short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Games to make your meetings more fun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: James from Marketing is yammering again. Take him out without interrupting the meeting. Meeting Intruders is the antidote to your meeting monotony. Blast away from the privacy of your own screen while solving business problems. Productivity has never been more destructive.
